item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/making-faces-by-kevyn-aucoin/#comment-325">Tisha F.</a>.
I'll check on an affiliate link and get back to you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tisha F..

I’ll check on an affiliate link and get back to you!

item.title: By: Tisha F.
item.dc:creator: Tisha F.
item.description: If I use the link that you posted in this blog to buy this book (which now I want really, really bad) will you make any money off of my purchase? Just to be clear, you making money would be the reason I DO purchase this book through your link.
